languages.text: "Я верю вам, регент Ааронто. Однако это уже второе покушение на Кассию. Мне нужны ответы".

traits.locale_text: "Я верю вам, регент Ааронто. Однако это уже второе покушение на Кассию. Мне нужны ответы".

languages.text: "I believe you, Regent Aaronto. And yet this is now the second attempt that has been made on Cassia's life. I need answers."
languages.original_text: "Я верю вам, регент Ааронто. Однако это уже второе покушение на Кассию. Мне нужны ответы".

traits.locale_text: "I believe you, regent Aaronto. And yet it was the second attempt on Cassia's life. I need answers."
"I believe you, regent Aaronto. And yet it was the second attempt on Cassia's life. I need answers."
"I believe you, Regent Aaronto. And yet this is now the second attempt that has been made on Cassia's life. I need answers."
"I believe you, Regent Aaronto. And yet this is now the second attempt that has been made on Cassia's life. I need answers."
"I believe you, Regent Aaronto. And yet this is now the second attempt that has been made on Cassia's life. I need answers."

languages.text: “我相信你，阿伦托摄政王。不过，这已经是第二次有人打算杀害卡西娅了，我需要真相。”
languages.original_text: "I believe you, Regent Aaronto. And yet this is now the second attempt that has been made on Cassia's life. I need answers."

traits.locale_text: “我相信你，阿伦托摄政王。不过，这已经是第二次有人打算杀害卡西娅了，我需要真相。”

languages.text: «Le creo, regente Aaronto. Pero eso no cambia que es el segundo atentado contra la vida de Cassia. Necesito respuestas».
languages.original_text: "I believe you, Regent Aaronto. And yet this is now the second attempt that has been made on Cassia's life. I need answers."

traits.locale_text: «Le creo, regente Aaronto. Pero eso no cambia que es el segundo atentado contra la vida de Cassia. Necesito respuestas».

languages.text: 「信じよう、摂政アーロント。だが、カシア殿の生命が狙われたのはこれで二度目だ。答えが必要だ」
languages.original_text: "I believe you, Regent Aaronto. And yet this is now the second attempt that has been made on Cassia's life. I need answers."

traits.locale_text: 「信じよう、摂政アーロント。だが、カシア殿の生命が狙われたのはこれで二度目だ。答えが必要だ」

languages.text: "Ich glaube Euch, Regent Aaronto. Dennoch ist dies nun schon der zweite Anschlag auf Cassias Leben. Ich brauche Antworten."
languages.original_text: "I believe you, Regent Aaronto. And yet this is now the second attempt that has been made on Cassia's life. I need answers."

traits.locale_text: "Ich glaube Euch, Regent Aaronto. Dennoch ist dies nun schon der zweite Anschlag auf Cassias Leben. Ich brauche Antworten."

languages.text: « Je vous crois, régent Aaronto, mais c'est la deuxième fois que l'on cherche à tuer Cassia. J'exige des réponses. »
languages.original_text: "I believe you, Regent Aaronto. And yet this is now the second attempt that has been made on Cassia's life. I need answers."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous crois, régent Aaronto, mais c'est la deuxième fois que l'on cherche à tuer Cassia. J'exige des réponses. »

languages.text: "Sana inanıyorum Naip Aaronto ancak bu, Cassia'nın yaşamına ikinci kez kastedilişi. Yanıt istiyorum."
languages.original_text: "I believe you, Regent Aaronto. And yet this is now the second attempt that has been made on Cassia's life. I need answers."

traits.locale_text: "Sana inanıyorum Naip Aaronto ancak bu, Cassia'nın yaşamına ikinci kez kastedilişi. Yanıt istiyorum."
